ComicInfo.Summary:
The boys go on a hike but everything goes wrong for them.
When Muggsy opens his own lemonade stand around the corner from Rollo and Rudy's stand, they try to trick each other into closing down.
Dizzy becomes a lawyer by correspondence course so he can stop Amster from harassing him.
Bo and Skinny each try to trick the other into catching fish (thus doing all the work) for their dinner.
Pinky and Winky get jobs at the carnival because they have no money to get in, but of course they are no good at the work.
The boys chase a runaway dog into a haunted house.

ComicInfo.Title: The Hike; Big Business!; Carnival Daze; Be It Ever So Haunted!
